key_features: Horse racing focus for free bets

content_gaps: No free bet calculator integration - all competitors link to but don't embed calculators
Limited wagering requirement transparency - competitors don't show turnover calculations
No expiry date tracking - free bets expire in 7 days but not visually highlighted
Missing payment method filtering - which offers work with specific deposit methods (e-wallets often excluded)
No minimum odds visual comparison - scattered in T&Cs vs upfront comparison
Limited mobile app claim instructions - desktop-focused claim processes shown
No GamStop impact explanation - how self-exclusion affects free bet eligibility
Missing matched betting guide - OLBG references but doesn't detail strategy
No free bet insurance offers - growing category (e.g., refund as free bet if loses)
Limited acca/accumulator free bet filtering - popular UK bet type not categorized separately

uk_specific_requirements.compliance: UK Gambling Commission (UKGC) licensing verification - all operators must display license number
uk_specific_requirements.payment_methods: UK-specific: Faster Payments, Bacs, UK debit cards only (credit card betting banned April 2020)
uk_specific_requirements.free_bet_regulations: Free bets cannot be withdrawn as cash (Gambling Act 2005), stake not returned with winnings
uk_specific_requirements.advertising_standards: ASA compliance - no 'free bet' in H1 without clear T&Cs (risk of misleading advertising)
uk_specific_requirements.taxation: UK betting tax-free for consumers - free bet winnings not subject to income tax
uk_specific_requirements.sports_focus: Football (Premier League focus), Horse Racing (Cheltenham/Grand National prominent), Cricket, Tennis

interactive_elements.purpose: Calculate real returns from free bet offers (stake not returned)
interactive_elements.implementation: Embed calculator + link to dedicated calculator page

interactive_elements.purpose: Show true value after turnover requirements (e.g., 1x, 3x, 5x rollover)
interactive_elements.implementation: Interactive slider showing bonus value reduction

interactive_elements.purpose: Sortable by: bonus amount, min odds, expiry, wagering requirement
interactive_elements.implementation: JavaScript filterable table with sticky header
Badge showing 'Valid until [date]' for seasonal offers
